title: Case Request workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a Case Request.

The workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase.

Metaphase: Classification

Phase Description Automatic transitions Manual transitions
Log After a request is successfully created, it enters the Log phase by default.
Log to Analysis : If the request is assigned to a person or group, it automatically transitions to Analysis.

Log to Abandon: If the user marks the request as solved while in the Log phase, or if the agent updates the request status to Rejected, it automatically transitions to Abandon.
Log to Abandon: The agent can manually transition the request to Abandon if it is no longer valid or relevant.

Metaphase: Fulfillment

Phase Description Automatic transitions Manual transitions
Analysis

The agent analyzes the request and proposes a solution with a completion code.
Analysis to Accept:  After a solution and completion code are provided, the request automatically transitions to Accept.
Analysis to Abandon: If the user marks the request as solved while in the Analysis phase, it automatically transitions to Abandon.

Analysis to Close:  If a social solution provided by followers fulfills the request, it automatically transitions to Close.
 Analysis to Abandon: The agent can manually transition the request to Abandon if it is no longer valid or relevant.

Metaphase: Validation

Phase Description Automatic transitions Manual transitions
Accept  The proposed solution and completion code are presented to the user. The user can either accept or reject the solution.
Accept to Close: If the user accepts the solution or if a social solution provided by followers fulfills the request, it automatically transitions to Close.
Accept to Review: If the user rejects the solution, it automatically transitions to Review.
 Accept to Close: The agent can manually transition the request to Close without waiting for user acceptance.
Review

The solution is rejected by the user. The agent has to review the rejection reasons and decide to rework the request or close it.

 No automatic transitions. Review to Analysis: The agent can manually transition the request back to Analysis if they decide to rework the solution.

Review to Close: The agent can manually transition the request to Close if they decide to close the request.

Metaphase: Done (End)

Phase Description
Close

The request is completed. No further transitions are allowed from the Close phase.
Abandon

The request is no longer relevant or valid.  No further transitions are allowed from the Abandon phase.
